outputs.output_descr:
The proposed project will seek to address (i) the lack of national institutional capacity to develop project proposals to access environment funds aimed at attaining global environmental benefits  and  (ii) the lack of projects being submitted  to the GEF by the Caribbean .This Project is therefore seeking to continue the technical support provided to the Caribbean SIDS through a two pronged approach:-
(i) the preparation of PIFs and PPGs for selected countries, and 
(ii) Institutional capacity building through the training of national partners in project development.
outputs.output_title: Cap. Build. for Instit. Cap. D

project_descr: The proposed project will seek to address the lack of national institutional capacity to develop project proposals to access environment funds aimed at attaining global environment benefits
